uiConfig.label: DateTime Format
uiConfig.helpInfo:
Common Format Codes

YYYY: Four digit year (e.g. 2024)

YY: Two digit year (e.g. 24 represents 2024)

MM: Month (01 to 12)

DD: day of the month (01 to 31)

HH: Hour (24-hour format, 00 to 23)

hh: Hour (12 hour format, 01 to 12)

mm: Minutes (00 to 59)

ss: Seconds (00 to 59)

SSSSSS: Microseconds (000000 to 999999)

A: AM or PM

ZZZ: Time Zone Name

Z: Time zone offset (e.g.+0000)
